languages.text: "Честно говоря, я порой не знаю, нужно ли мне пугаться неуемной борзости нашего тощего ксеноса или же восхищаться ей..."
"Honestly, sometimes I just can't tell if I should be scared of the sheer cheek of our skinny xenos or impressed by it..."
languages.original_text: "Честно говоря, я порой не знаю, нужно ли мне пугаться неуемной борзости нашего тощего ксеноса или же восхищаться ей..."

traits.locale_text: "Honestly, sometimes I just can't tell if I should be scared of the sheer cheek of our skinny xenos or impressed by it..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ehrlich, manchmal weiß ich nicht, ob ich Angst vor der schieren Dreistigkeit unseres dürren Xenos haben soll oder beeindruckt davon sein soll ..."
languages.original_text: "Honestly, sometimes I just can't tell if I should be scared of the sheer cheek of our skinny xenos or impressed by it..."

traits.locale_text: "Ehrlich, manchmal weiß ich nicht, ob ich Angst vor der schieren Dreistigkeit unseres dürren Xenos haben soll oder beeindruckt davon sein soll ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “老实说，有时候我真的不知道，这只瘦猴异形的凶狠嘴脸是应该让我感到害怕，还是应该让我心生钦佩……”
languages.original_text: "Honestly, sometimes I just can't tell if I should be scared of the sheer cheek of our skinny xenos or impressed by it..."

traits.locale_text: “老实说，有时候我真的不知道，这只瘦猴异形的凶狠嘴脸是应该让我感到害怕，还是应该让我心生钦佩……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Honnêtement, j'ignore si je devrais avoir peur des joues transparentes de notre frêle xénos ou si je devrais être impressionnée... »
languages.original_text: "Honestly, sometimes I just can't tell if I should be scared of the sheer cheek of our skinny xenos or impressed by it..."

traits.locale_text: « Honnêtement, j'ignore si je devrais avoir peur des joues transparentes de notre frêle xénos ou si je devrais être impressionnée... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «La verdad, a veces no sé si la audacia de nuestro xenos esmirriado es aterradora o impresionante».
languages.original_text: "Honestly, sometimes I just can't tell if I should be scared of the sheer cheek of our skinny xenos or impressed by it..."

traits.locale_text: «La verdad, a veces no sé si la audacia de nuestro xenos esmirriado es aterradora o impresionante».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「正直なところ、痩せ細ったゼノの薄い頬を見て恐れるべきなのか、感心すべきなのか、時々わからなくなる…」
languages.original_text: "Honestly, sometimes I just can't tell if I should be scared of the sheer cheek of our skinny xenos or impressed by it..."

traits.locale_text: 「正直なところ、痩せ細ったゼノの薄い頬を見て恐れるべきなのか、感心すべきなのか、時々わからなくなる…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Sıska zenomuzun aşırı küstahlığından korksam mı yoksa etkilensem mi bazen bilemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Honestly, sometimes I just can't tell if I should be scared of the sheer cheek of our skinny xenos or impressed by it..."

traits.locale_text: "Sıska zenomuzun aşırı küstahlığından korksam mı yoksa etkilensem mi bazen karar veremiyorum cidden."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
